summary: Defines a comprehensive hierarchy of MAPDL‑specific exception classes and auxiliary decorators/handlers to standardize error reporting and management across the PyMAPDL library.
business_intent: Enable developers and end‑users of the PyMAPDL API to reliably detect, differentiate, and respond to a wide range of ANSYS Mechanical APDL failures—such as connection issues, licensing problems, version mismatches, resource constraints, deprecations, and communication errors—thereby improving robustness and debuggability of simulation workflows.
